titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: There is no meeting of the Reunion Committee today, and I cleared off some matters, e.g. I wrote a letter for the Durham Diocesan Magazine, and sent it to the Editor, Hughes. I paid the dentist, and yet another demand for taxes. I wrote to the Abp. of Upsala, accepting his suggestions as to my plans. Then I went into the City, & changed a cheque.]
